author: hdu
msg: #i122362# omit fetching of stlport4 tarballs if possible
it doesn't make sense to download them if they are not used

author: hdu
msg: #i122208# include <algorithm> explicitly if functions from <algorithm> are used
most STLs include relevant parts of it indirectly, but
one can not depend on it (seen with MSVC's tr1 headers)

author: robbie
msg: PROTON-320: use varags for the mechanisms parameter to simplify usage for clients
